subject: English
title: Chapter 49 From the Postbox 3
content:
--- Page 1 ---
Read the following and write your own messages. ee

Sonali, Neeta, Himani and Manish are all friends.
Sometimes they have fights and quarrels.
But they get over their quarrels.
That is because they know a magic word.
You can read it in Sonali’s letter to Neeta.
Can you find it ?

nals. Lan angry wilh you
= wail not falk to your Neéla
a a

onali, youd anf

of ; abs TD tim
th tim ith ne

Friends again !
Did you find the magic word ?

a2 feciern fasaaraee Ue Hea Ta eld. AAS Aelia THA HAM SA waa. A Vara HA seclel feed ararea Fest sat

SUG. AK CA STASTAR APAshet SAAT F VAT PTSVArS Sica ex ferst Paral SA ATet.

UNIT 5 7)
